Network Next. | Software Engineer | ONSITE (Santa Monica, CA).

We're creating the internet fast lane for games.

https://networknext.com

Fun and diverse team, competitive salary and generous equity on sliding scale. Come join us, we just raised our seed round and we're scaling up.

https://venturebeat.com/2019/01/23/network-next-raises-4-4-m...

We're looking for software engineers, devops, and network engineers, or any mix of the previous three in one person :)

We work in C/C++/Golang. Our marketplace runs on Google cloud in Kubernetes. We also have a need for programmers to work on our website platform and work in XDP, eBPF for people who want to work on our SDN overlay routers.

Apply here: careers@networknext.com
